name: Flaky Buttermilk Biscuits
author: Brendan Biernacki
summary: The best buttery and flaky buttermilk biscuits you'll ever have.
ingredients: 4 cups Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
directions: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Whisk flour, baking powder, sugar, baking soda, and salt together in a large bowl
Cut butter in with a pastry blender or 2 knives until it resembles bread crumbs
Put biscuit dough onto a floured surface and sprinkle a bit of extra flour on top
Cut out 16 biscuits with a biscuit or cookie cutter and place on the prepared baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown on top, about 10 minutes
